roleset.name: think about, ponder

roles.note: Arg1 will take the entire SBAR, not just the S.

example.name: very typical
example.text: At the same time, the sheer size of the loss, coupled with a slowing of orders, made some securities analysts wonder just how strong that turnaround will be at the computer maker and defense-electronics concern.
example.arg: just how strong that turnaround will be at the computer maker and defense-electronics concern

example.name: with a PP instead
example.text: Not everyone is reacting so calmly, however, and many wonder about the long-term implications of what is widely viewed as the cause of Friday's slide, reluctance by banks to provide financing for a buy-out of UAL Corp., parent of United Airlines.
example.arg: about the long-term implications of what is widely viewed as the cause of Friday's slide , reluctance by banks to provide financing for a buy-out of UAL Corp., parent of United Airlines

roleset.note: VN updated by Julia, 10/2010. Member of Vncls care-88.1-1,

example.name: poor John
example.text: John wondered at the display of unreasoning hatred directed at him from all the other kids.
example.arg: at the display of unreasoning hatred directed at him from all the other kids

predicate.note: Frames file for 'wonder' based on sentences in financial subcorpus.
